column4: Is it just me, or does window audio apps have cooler names then linux audio apps, I know linux has banshee which is cool, but banshee doesn't work, and I am stuck for what I what I need to do with quod libet, which I don't even know what it means, or what langauge its from, it sounds like giberish.
Rhythmbox, Amarok - those are cool names.
windows has all those cool audio players with the names like amp and stuff, its like having a virtual amp on your computer
